name: Pixtr
overview:
Pixtr is a paradigm shift – up until now, picture improving tools were focused on the professional photographer. Pixtr delivers professional results to anyone taking a picture on any camera.

Pixtr is about getting a great shot, in one click, without being a photography expert.

Pixtr makes image improvement mainstream by focusing on the main objects in pictures – people, and making them look better.

No matter if you are having a bad day, you aren’t photogenic or if you have the same problem we do – not being a super model, you will always look yourself at your best.

Pixtr will eventually become the standard for picture taking – all of the pictures on the internet will pass through Pixtr.
